branding.tagline: Build Explores that allow business users to create machine learning models for classifying and profiling groups of similar records.

looker_temp_dataset_name.label: Looker Temp Dataset Name
looker_temp_dataset_name.description: The temporary dataset for Looker PDTs must be located in the US multi-region location to use this blockâ€™s example Explore. If your default BigQuery connection uses a temporary dataset located outside of the US, ask your Looker Admin to create another BigQuery connection in Looker with the temporary dataset for PDTs located in the US.
